summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Simulation Lab - molecular docking functionality working correctly with all test steps passing

design_issues.issue: 3D viewer canvas element not easily detectable in DOM, but functionality works correctly
Success toast notification not visible after simulation completion

passed_tests: Simulation Page UI displays correctly (Steps 1, 2, 3 visible)
Ligand selection from history works (caffeine selected)
Target selection works (SARS-CoV-2 Main Protease selected)
Start Simulation button becomes enabled after selections
Binding Affinity score displays correctly (-5.81 kcal/mol)
Score breakdown shows Van der Waals and Electrostatic components
Backend simulation API returns correct results
Results panel displays docking results with SUCCESS status
